title: Udyam Registration Form
description: Complete schema for Udyam MSME registration form

steps.title: Applicant Details
steps.description: Enter entrepreneur and business owner information

fields.name: fullName
fields.label: Full Name
fields.placeholder: Enter full name as per Aadhaar
fields.description: Enter your full name exactly as it appears on your Aadhaar card

validation.message: Name should contain only letters and spaces

fields.name: panNumber
fields.label: PAN Number
fields.description: Enter your 10-digit PAN (Permanent Account Number)

fields.name: aadhaarNumber
fields.label: Aadhaar Number
fields.description: Enter your 12-digit Aadhaar number

fields.name: email
fields.label: Email Address
fields.description: Enter a valid email address for communication

fields.name: mobileNumber
fields.label: Mobile Number
fields.description: Enter your 10-digit mobile number

fields.name: dateOfBirth
fields.label: Date of Birth
fields.description: Enter your date of birth as per Aadhaar

validation.message: Date of birth cannot be in the future

fields.name: enterpriseName
fields.label: Enterprise Name
fields.description: Enter the official name of your enterprise

fields.name: enterpriseType
fields.label: Enterprise Type
fields.description: Select the legal structure of your enterprise

fields.name: commencementDate
fields.label: Date of Commencement
fields.description: Enter the date when your business operations started

validation.message: Commencement date cannot be in the future

fields.name: gstNumber
fields.label: GST Number
fields.description: Enter GST number if registered (optional)

fields.name: hasEmployees
fields.label: Do you have employees?
fields.description: Indicate if your enterprise has employees

fields.name: employeeCount
fields.label: Number of Employees
fields.description: Enter total number of employees including yourself

fields.name: pinCode
fields.label: PIN Code
fields.description: Enter 6-digit PIN code of your business location

fields.name: state
fields.label: State
fields.placeholder: Will be auto-filled based on PIN
fields.description: State will be automatically populated based on PIN code

fields.name: district
fields.label: District
fields.placeholder: Will be auto-filled based on PIN
fields.description: District will be automatically populated based on PIN code

fields.name: address
fields.label: Complete Address
fields.placeholder: Enter complete address including building/plot number, street, locality
fields.description: Provide complete address of your business location

fields.name: sameAsOwner
fields.label: Business address same as owner's address
fields.description: Check if business address is same as owner's address

steps.title: Bank & Investment Details
steps.description: Provide banking information and investment details

fields.name: ifscCode
fields.label: Bank IFSC Code
fields.description: Enter 11-character IFSC code of your bank

fields.name: bankName
fields.label: Bank Name
fields.placeholder: Will be auto-filled based on IFSC
fields.description: Bank name will be automatically populated

fields.name: branchName
fields.label: Branch Name
fields.placeholder: Will be auto-filled based on IFSC
fields.description: Branch name will be automatically populated

fields.name: accountNumber
fields.label: Bank Account Number
fields.description: Enter your business bank account number

validation.message: Account number should contain only digits

fields.name: plantMachineryInvestment
fields.label: Investment in Plant & Machinery (₹)
fields.description: Enter investment amount in plant and machinery in rupees

fields.name: annualTurnover
fields.label: Annual Turnover (₹)
fields.description: Enter annual turnover of previous financial year in rupees

messages.pan: PAN must be in format ABCDE1234F (5 letters, 4 digits, 1 letter)
messages.aadhaar: Aadhaar must be 12 digits and cannot start with 0 or 1
messages.gstin: GST number must be in correct 15-character format
messages.ifsc: IFSC must be in format BANK0123456 (4 letters, 1 zero, 6 alphanumeric)
messages.phone: Mobile number must be 10 digits starting with 6, 7, 8, or 9
messages.pincode: PIN code must be 6 digits and cannot start with 0
